text:

Fast forward to 3yr summer

author: Mohit  Kumar

text:
Beteeee betteeeee kya likhu bhai bihari bhosdike
Dekh itta keh skta hu koi aur se mile ya na mile tu aur naveen se milne to mai tumhare ghr tak aa jaunga
Wing me sabse phle to nhi but sabse achi bonding tere se hi hui thi

Me-"bihari abhi koi lab h kya"
You - nhi
Me-15 min me ready hokr neeche mil

Baaki kha jana h kya krne jana hai wo sab pahuch kr decide kr lenge 

Bht baar to bas jaate the aur bina kuch kiye aa jate the ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
 
Bhai bonding k liye cricket hi kaafi hota hai aur apan to wingiee bhi the baad me tujhe adopt kr liya tha wo baat alag hai 
To cricket me tu bowling bht Shi krta hai atleast mai to nhi hi maar pata tha tere ko, bsdk wicket aur le leta tha tu meri 
Akela lund aadmi tha jisko confidence rhta tha ki isse to nhi hi pitunga 
Baaki batting me jhaatu I mean jhaadu lgate reh pitch saaf rhegi ğŸ˜‚

C-top pe tu, mai  daaku , sutte and wo subh 3 4 baje tak wali conversations(bhnchood daaku ko aaj bhi Sutta fokkna nhi aaya haiğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚) 
Isko to feel kar hi paa rha hoga na wo thandi thadi hwaye, aankho me neend, still baithey hai fook rhe hai, kyoki uthne ka man nhi kr rha 
Baaki I'm glad teri wo humanity finally khtm hui bhnklode pta nhi kitto ko awi Jane diya (aunty ko to nhi Jane dena tha ğŸ¤¦â€â™‚ï¸ğŸ˜  chutiya lund ) 
Fir wo summer me double room and wo toh bhai epic tha mtlb alag hi vibes hai us room ki, life beeta skte hai wese to ham
Routine kya rhta tha din bhr backchoodi 
Cricket match, movie, tera wo special bed bhai apne room me jo bhi aata tha wha kuch der ruk k hi jata tha, wha se koi bina enjoy kiye nhi ja skta tha

cricket dekho, cricket khelo, fir meena ji aaye bhai ko loda frk nhi pdta kya pehna hai hamne (mere ko bhi nhi pdta tha ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚) 
"Chicken bnaye aaj" 
"gate se kon lekr aayega" 
And mera jana to confirm rhta tha baaki dusra banda koi bhi ho skta tha 
, aur wo harsh ko toh bola hai mane ki masala jalne se phle chicken daale next time se (hag diya tha lodu ne) 
Best rommie tha tu and I'm sure tera bhi mai hi hunga 
Baaki daku k saath milkr bht li hai tune ğŸ¤¬ğŸ¤¬

Last me thoda chood failaya mane and ache se dekhu to usme galti meri hi thi 
Bht chutiya decisions liya tha bhai mane, I tried ki sab normal ho but kitta try krta ek toh last me reality kuch aur hi nikli and meri side se socho to start me i was wrong but last me toh I was try to defend myself anyway Jo hua so hua,
Last me tu shi time pe saath tha so bete tune apna kaam shi se kiya, ya kahu ki god ne apna kaam ache se kiya 

"Chai peene chl rha hai" ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
"madarchod"
Bhai kitti bar apna mind same cheez sochta tha I wish ham same city me aaye kisi trh and fir I don't think tere pass falt share krne k liye koi aur option hoga 

And wo placements ka toh mrko sch me yaad bhi nhi ki mane kese baat ki thi, khud ka chuda hua tha toh i don't remember mai kese react kr rha tha but normal hone k baad sayd mood shi tha toh congratulations bolne ki formality kr di hogi ğŸ˜œ
Baaki toh naveen ko pta hai ki ham dono ko mere se zyada khushi tere placed hone ki thi
Tera jo thoda bht interest politics me hai use bnaye rkh, Bihar se I want you to be a great political support (practically bhi sochna padta haiğŸ˜œ)
Wese mai ye conclude krne wali baatey kyo likh rha hu, apni picture toh abhi baaki Hai
You and daaku were(are) my biggest support 
Love you â™¥ â™¥
